Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerRMI

Class ClientHandlerRMI

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ClientHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerRMI.ClientHandlerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualGameServer, ObserverMessageToClient<MessageToClient>, Runnable, Remote
public class ClientHandlerRMI extends ClientHandler implements VirtualGameServer
This class is used server-side to represents a client that is connected to server using RMI. It acts as a VirtualGameServer for that client: each player has his onw VirtualGameServer when he connects to a game.
